article_title: Fatal motorcycle accident closes SB lanes of Peoria in Montbello – The Denver Post
article_text:
Southbound Peoria Street was closed for about an hour at East 46th Avenue as Denver police investigated a fatal accident.

The accident between a vehicle and a motorcycle was reported about 7:30 p.m. Saturday, according to Denver Police Department tweets. No further information about the collision was released.

Peoria is one of the main access points to the Montbello neighborhood in northeast Denver.
